title: Is that LOL's customer service actually a robot?
body: someone just stole it  and it had binding my credit card so I seriously need to get my acc back as soon as possible but I tried to contact riot but nobody answer me for a week. is that Riot's customer service actually a robot or dead acc? is there any way like online service or phone number any thing like that? Should I called police for help on this because I had saw this guy played my acc with a skin I never bought it before?BTW this is my another acc that had added friend list to my main acc so I know what this bitch had done

replies.body: Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team- who are actually people! - will help you out.   In the meantime, you should review our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide for safety practices to secure your information in and out of league as well.  It may be a bit depending on the size of the queue for the day, but we'll respond as soon as we can.  Keep in mind that continuing to reply to your ticket can drop you back to the bottom of the queue until a specialist receives your case.  Hang tight!
